  1. """Templatetags for the ``document_library`` app."""
  2. from django import template
  4. from simple_translation.middleware import filter_queryset_language
  6. from document_library.models import Document, DocumentTitle
  9. register = template.Library()
  12. @register.assignment_tag
  13. def get_files_for_document(document):
  14. """Returns all available files for the given document."""
  15. titles = DocumentTitle.objects.filter(
  16. document=document, filer_file__isnull=False)
  17. files = [title.filer_file for title in titles]
  18. return files
  21. @register.assignment_tag(takes_context=True)
  22. def get_frontpage_documents(context):
  23. """Returns the library favs that should be shown on the front page."""
  24. req = context.get('request')
  25. qs = Document.objects.published(req).filter(is_on_front_page=True)
  26. return qs
